DataElement.preferredName: Medical Condition Performed Observation Outcome Severity Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the intensity of the condition. EXAMPLE(S): (1) Moderate could be used to describe acne. (2) Values of: none,mild or trivial,moderate or severe,valve replacement,unknown could be used for a aorta valvular insufficiency.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Condition Performed Observation Outcome Severity Code
